attributes.action: put pressure on the Japanese government to stop the annual cruel and horrific slaughter of small whales and dolphins.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The killing of whales and endangered species violates international law, and this systematic slaughter of more than 23,000 small whales and dolphins is conducted every year in Taiji, and elsewhere in Japan. It is barbaric and unacceptable to a civilized world in the 21st century.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
